        <script>
    var EM = EM || {};
    EM.translations = EM.translations || {};EM.translations["Jan."] = "Ian.";EM.translations["Feb."] = "Feb.";EM.translations["Mar."] = "Mar.";EM.translations["Apr."] = "Apr.";EM.translations["May."] = "Mai";EM.translations["Jun."] = "Iun.";EM.translations["Jul."] = "Iul.";EM.translations["Aug."] = "Aug.";EM.translations["Sept."] = "Sept.";EM.translations["Oct."] = "Oct.";EM.translations["Nov."] = "Nov.";EM.translations["Dec."] = "Dec.";</script>
<script>

    </p>

            </div></div><div class="card-toolbox"><button type="button" class="add-to-favorites btn btn-lg btn-block gtm_mg090118" data-productid="32581581" data-offerid="7110822" data-type="micro" data-size="lg" data-product="{&quot;pnk&quot;:&quot;D1RCK2MBM&quot;,&quot;productid&quot;:32581581,&quot;offerid&quot;:7110822,&quot;has_family&quot;:false,&quot;is_family&quot;:false,&quot;options_modal&quot;:false,&quot;product_name&quot;:&quot;Masina de spalat rufe Samsung WW70TA046AX/LE, 7 kg, 1400 RPM, Clasa B, Eco Bubble, Bubble Soak, Steam, Smart Check, Motor Digital Inverter, Inox&quot;,&quot;currency&quot;:&quot;RON&quot;,&quot;price&quot;:2032.44,&quot;category_trail&quot;:&quot;Electrocasnice &amp; Climatizare/Masini spalat rufe/Masini de spalat rufe&quot;,&quot;scm_super_category&quot;:null}" data-ref="graph_profiled_similar_1_18">

    <section class="page-section page-section-light gtm_product-page-description">
        <a id="description-section" class="scroll-anchor"></a>
        <div class="container pad-btm-sm">
            <h2 class="page-section-title">Descriere</h2>
            <div id="collapse-wrapper-description">
                <div class="product-page-description description-banner-right">
                    <div class="product-page-description-text">
                        <div class="collapse-offset" id="description-body" style="overflow-y: hidden; height: 600px;"><figure class="table"><table><tbody><tr><td colspan="2"><p style="text-align:center;"><strong>Masina de spalat rufe Arctic APL61015XLW3, 6kg, 1000 RPM, Clasa E, ExtraSteam, Eco Dose, Alb</strong></p></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><figure class="image"><img style="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/33935/33934010/media/res_78e7d904ee09dda775a08c1db78b1bb2.jpg" class=" lazy" width="" height=""></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><p>&nbsp;<strong>Beneficii:</strong></p><ul><li>Masina de spalat rufe <strong>standard</strong> cu incarcare &nbsp;<strong>frontala;</strong></li><li>Capacitate de incarcare de <strong>6 kg</strong>, potrivita pentru o familie de 2-3 membrii;</li><li>Hublou cu un diametru de <strong>34</strong> <strong>cm</strong> si deschidere pe partea stanga;</li><li>Este echipata cu <strong>15</strong> programe de spalare;</li><li>Viteza maxima de centrifugare de <strong>1000 rotatii pe minut</strong>, si un zgomot de <strong>72</strong> db la centrifugare si <strong>60</strong> db la spalare;</li><li>Masina de spalat rufe dotata cu tehnologiile<strong> ExtraSteam, Aqua Surf,</strong> iar ca functii, <strong>Autocuratare cu ExtraSteam, Afisare Timp ramas, Eco Heater, Amanare pornire pana la 24 ore, Child Lock, Eco Wash.</strong></li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td colspan="2">Masina de spalat Arctic <strong>APL61015XLW3</strong> dotata cu <strong>tehnologia ExtraSteam</strong> te ajuta sa ai grija de hainele tale delicate si te scapa de orice cuta nedorita. Design-ul special Aqua Surf creeaza conditii optime de spalare pentru rufele tale si asigura o curatare eficienta, dar si delicata, fara miscari ce ar putea afecta tesatura.</td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><figure class="image"><img style="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/33110/33109011/media/res_58ca6fb0f318065d12c43bbe98cace7d.jpg" class=" lazy" width="" height=""></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><p style="margin-left:0in;"><strong>ExtraSteam</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0in;">Cu ajutorul tehnologiei ExtraSteam hainele tale au parte de o ingrijire delicata si scapi de cutele nedorite. Articolele tale preferate de imbracaminte se vor mentine impecabil datorita aburului care se poate utiliza la inceput sau la final in functie de programul selectat. Daca aburul este eliberat la inceputul programului are rolul de a inmuia hainele murdare usurand astfel procesul de curatare, iar daca este eliberat la final are o contributie majora pentru inlaturarea cutelor, tesaturile devenind placute la atingere. ExtraSteam trateaza cu delicatete hainele si te ajuta sa te bucuri de ele un timp indelungat.</p><p style="margin-left:0in;">&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-left:0in;"></p><div class="plyr plyr--video plyr--fullscreen-enabled plyr--stopped"><div class="plyr__video-wrapper" style="cursor: pointer;"><div class="plyr__captions"></div><video poster="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/catalog/video/preview/encoding/delivery/thumbnail/54891_2107603960.jpg?width=640&amp;height=360&amp;hash=988EAFF6765BE3D9FB0A49863A0B9845" preload="none"><source src="https://emag-video2.akamaized.net/encoding/delivery/mp4/54891_2107603976.mp4" type="video/mp4"></video></div><button type="button" data-plyr="play" class="plyr__play-large" aria-label="Play"><svg><use xlink:href="#plyr-play"></use></svg><span class="plyr__sr-only">Play</span></button><div class="plyr__controls"><button type="button" data-plyr="play" aria-label="Play"><svg><use xlink:href="#plyr-play"></use></svg><span class="plyr__sr-only">Play</span></button><button type="button" data-plyr="pause"><svg><use xlink:href="#plyr-pause"></use></svg><span class="plyr__sr-only">Pause</span></button><span class="plyr__progress"><label for="seek9032" class="plyr__sr-only">Seek</label><input id="seek9032" class="plyr__progress--seek" type="range" min="0" max="100" step="0.1" value="0" data-plyr="seek"><progress class="plyr__progress--played" max="100" value="0" role="presentation"></progress><progress class="plyr__progress--buffer" max="100" value="0"><span>0</span>% buffered</progress><span class="plyr__tooltip">00:00</span></span><span class="plyr__time"><span class="plyr__sr-only">Current time</span><span class="plyr__time--current">00:00</span></span><button type="button" data-plyr="mute" aria-pressed="false"><svg class="icon--muted"><use xlink:href="#plyr-muted"></use></svg><svg><use xlink:href="#plyr-volume"></use></svg><span class="plyr__sr-only">Toggle Mute</span></button><span class="plyr__volume"><label for="volume9032" class="plyr__sr-only">Volume</label><input id="volume9032" class="plyr__volume--input" type="range" min="0" max="10" value="5" data-plyr="volume"><progress class="plyr__volume--display" max="10" value="5" role="presentation"></progress></span><button type="button" data-plyr="captions"><svg class="icon--captions-on"><use xlink:href="#plyr-captions-on"></use></svg><svg><use xlink:href="#plyr-captions-off"></use></svg><span class="plyr__sr-only">Toggle Captions</span></button><button type="button" data-plyr="fullscreen" aria-pressed="false"><svg class="icon--exit-fullscreen"><use xlink:href="#plyr-exit-fullscreen"></use></svg><svg><use xlink:href="#plyr-enter-fullscreen"></use></svg><span class="plyr__sr-only">Toggle Fullscreen</span></button></div></div><div class="js-description-video-thumbnail" data-sources="" style="position: relative; background-image: url(&quot;https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/catalog/video/preview/encoding/delivery/thumbnail/54891_2107603960.jpg?width=640&amp;height=360&amp;hash=988EAFF6765BE3D9FB0A49863A0B9845&quot;); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; background-size: contain; width: 480px; height: 320px; display: none;"><div style="position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; margin-top: -32px; margin-left: -32px; background-image: url('https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/play_symbol@2x.png'); width: 64px; height: 64px;"></div></div> 
<p></p></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><p><strong>Tipul de masina</strong> de spalat rufe <strong>standard</strong> este cea mai intalnita varianta, deoarece poate fi plasata oriunde, atat timp cat este conectata la un canal de scurgere si la o instalatie de apa.&nbsp;<br><br>Masina de spalat cu <strong>incarcare frontala</strong> este un model clasic, datorita hubloului transparent prin care poti observa usor ce se intampla cu rufele tale.</p><p><strong>Capacitatea masinii de spalat</strong>, exprimata in kilograme, reprezinta greutatea hainelor pe care masina de spalat le poate spala eficient, fara a folosi surplus de energie sau de apa sau fara a dura prea mult si a afecta eficienta procesului de spalare. Capacitatea de spalare se masoara in haine uscate.</p><p>Diametrul mare de <strong>34 cm</strong> al hubloului iti permite incarcarea foarte usoara a rufelor murdare in masina de spalat. Hubloul este pozitionat mai sus, prin comparatie cu celelalte masini de spalat, ceea ce permite o incarcare mult mai facila a masinii de spalat.&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Viteza de centrifugare&nbsp;</strong>este exprimata in rotatii pe minut si este un alt criteriu de care trebuie tinut cont atunci cand este achizitionata o masina de spalat. Cu cat viteza de centrifugare e mai mare, cu atat mai uscate sunt hainele dupa spalare.<br><br><strong>Nivelul de zgomot&nbsp;</strong> este important daca avem nevoie de liniste sau un zgomot redus. Este masurat in decibeli iar o valoare mica iti va asigura confortul dorit.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Consumul</strong> de energie electrica si de apa al masinii de spalat rufe este dat si prin clasa de eficienta energetica. Cu cat clasa de eficienta energetica este mai mare, de la A+++ la D, cu atat consumul de energie si apa este mai mic.</p></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Programe</strong></td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Camasi 40°C cu&nbsp;ExtraSteam</strong><br><br>Acest program este folosit pentru a spala impreuna camasi din bumbac, materiale sintetice sau combinate. Reduce cutele. La sfarsitul programului se utilizeaza abur pentru a ajuta la reducerea cutelor.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_ae59d63a06b3ceaf3227b42c439fcb8b.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Geci cu puf 40°C cu&nbsp;ExtraSteam</strong><br><br>Acest program este dedicat pentru a va spala hainele, vestele, jachetele etc. ce contin puf, a caror eticheta recomanda „spalare la masina”. La sfarsitul programului se utilizeaza abur pentru a inmuia rufele groase precum prosoapele.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_4e1319d6c87cfe29cfe3228bca81b1a1.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Bumbac 60 C cu prespalare</strong></p><p>Program dedicat spalarii hainelor de bumbac care necesita prespalare. Aceasta optiune va asigura o mai buna indepartare a petelor, fara a agresa tesatura.</p><p>&nbsp;</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_1c68e893f9294d37a79c0c7b031e2f47.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure><p style="text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><p style="margin-left:0px;"><strong>Spalare rapida 30 grade C</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Program dedicat hainelor din bumbac, cu un grad redus de murdarie. Ai haine gata de purtare, in cel mai scurt timp posibil.</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_1d509124d672a219759060c24d01bd4c.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Lana/Spalare manuala</strong></p><p><span style="font-size:14px;">Acest program este dedicat articolelor din lana/materialelor delicate cu conditia sa fie respectate instructiuniile de pe eticheta. Rufele vor fi igenizate utilizandu-se o actiune de spalare delicata pentru a nu deteriora imbracamintea. Te poti bucura in continuare de hainele tale delicate fara a iti face griji ca tesaturile vor avea de suferit.</span></p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_d4c87b644503723473baec7c6cb28bb8.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Bumbac 40°C</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Program de spalare la 40 grade a rufelor din bumbac. Astfel, poti obtine rufe curate chiar si atunci cand tesatura este delicata.</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32259/32258677/media/res_c0684fe8384ae55843d77393f1e4f098.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><strong>Tehnologii si functii</strong></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Amanare pornire</strong><br><br>Functia iti permite programarea spalarii intr-un interval de 9 ore. Astfel, nu mai esti nevoit sa iti planifici activitatile dupa programul de spalare a rufelor. Tu decizi cand incepe programul dorit, indiferent de durata sau intensitate.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/20155/20154438/media/res_958e593e2a0ab5270e3980c4ddce597e.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Child Lock</strong><br><br>Permite blocarea butoanelor masinii de spalat pentru a preveni oprirea accidentala sau schimbarea programului. Aparatul tau Arctic este gandit sa iti ofere un plus de siguranta, fiind potrivit pentru tine si familia ta. Copiii tai se pot juca langa masina de spalat, fara ca tu sa-i supraveghezi permanent.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_f9e3d6a7cc411784e0ff80d4c7d9ff31.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Sistem electronic de control al balansului</strong><br><br>Sistemul distribuie uniform rufele in interiorul tamburului (recipientul in care sunt spalate rufele), diminuand vibratiile si zgomotul produs in timpul stoarcerii, pentru o functionare mai silentioasa. Poti folosi masina de spalat Arctic in orice moment al zilei. Speli eficient si cu minim de zgomot!</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_ce173a0732bd7fad206d1e0f920bf33d.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><p style="margin-left:0px;"><strong>Sistem electronic de ajustare a cantitatii de apa</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Pentru a obtine cele mai bune performante de spalare si consum energetic redus, acest sistem automat de reglare a consumului de apa vine in ajutorul tau! Aportul de apa este ajustat electronic in functie de cantitatea si tipul rufelor, astfel ca tu sa ai cele mai bune rezultate cu un minim de efort.</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_63a623a596ffdc85739d1bab129e2b71.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Aqua Surf</strong><br><br>Design-ul special Aqua Surf creeaza conditii optime de spalare pentru rufele tale si asigura o curatare eficienta, dar si delicata, fara miscari ce ar putea afecta tesatura. Conturul unic al cuvei si forma paletelor permit o miscare fluida a rufelor in timpul spalarii, imitand ritmul natural al valurilor.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_0e95602328918cf3a401e27dac03127e.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Eco Heater</strong><br><br>Rezistenta masinii este acoperita cu un strat de nichel care protejeaza de rugina si asigura o durabilitate de 100 de ori mai mare decat rezistentele standard si depuneri de calcar cu 40% mai mici. Masina ta va functiona eficient si economic pentru o perioada indelungata!</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/16415/16414105/media/res_4e162da79748cd771ded610feecdeb57.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr><tr><td><p style="margin-left:0px;"><strong>Autocuratare cu ExtraSteam</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Acest program te ajuta sa indepartezi rezidurile si depunerile de detergent cu ajutorul aburului, astfel ca masina ta de spalat isi mentine buna functionare o perioada cat mai indelungata si de asemenea, se indeparteaza mirosurile neplacute.&nbsp;</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_1c2f6e465d40d91c6550606af467a17f.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src="></figure></td></tr><tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td></tr></tbody></table></figure></div>

            <h4 class="modal-title close"><i class="em em-left font-size-base"></i> Inapoi in pagina de produs</h4>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
            <div class="product-page-description">
                <div class="product-page-description-text">
                    <figure class="table"><table><tbody><tr><td colspan="2"><p style="text-align:center;"><strong>Masina de spalat rufe Arctic APL61015XLW3, 6kg, 1000 RPM, Clasa E, ExtraSteam, Eco Dose, Alb</strong></p></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><figure class="image"><img style="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/33935/33934010/media/res_78e7d904ee09dda775a08c1db78b1bb2.jpg" class=" lazy" width="" height="" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><p> <strong>Beneficii:</strong></p><ul><li>Masina de spalat rufe <strong>standard</strong> cu incarcare  <strong>frontala;</strong></li><li>Capacitate de incarcare de <strong>6 kg</strong>, potrivita pentru o familie de 2-3 membrii;</li><li>Hublou cu un diametru de <strong>34</strong> <strong>cm</strong> si deschidere pe partea stanga;</li><li>Este echipata cu <strong>15</strong> programe de spalare;</li><li>Viteza maxima de centrifugare de <strong>1000 rotatii pe minut</strong>, si un zgomot de <strong>72</strong> db la centrifugare si <strong>60</strong> db la spalare;</li><li>Masina de spalat rufe dotata cu tehnologiile<strong> ExtraSteam, Aqua Surf,</strong> iar ca functii, <strong>Autocuratare cu ExtraSteam, Afisare Timp ramas, Eco Heater, Amanare pornire pana la 24 ore, Child Lock, Eco Wash.</strong></li></ul><p> </p></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td colspan="2">Masina de spalat Arctic <strong>APL61015XLW3</strong> dotata cu <strong>tehnologia ExtraSteam</strong> te ajuta sa ai grija de hainele tale delicate si te scapa de orice cuta nedorita. Design-ul special Aqua Surf creeaza conditii optime de spalare pentru rufele tale si asigura o curatare eficienta, dar si delicata, fara miscari ce ar putea afecta tesatura.</td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><figure class="image"><img style="" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/33110/33109011/media/res_58ca6fb0f318065d12c43bbe98cace7d.jpg" class=" lazy" width="" height="" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><p style="margin-left:0in;"><strong>ExtraSteam</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0in;">Cu ajutorul tehnologiei ExtraSteam hainele tale au parte de o ingrijire delicata si scapi de cutele nedorite. Articolele tale preferate de imbracaminte se vor mentine impecabil datorita aburului care se poate utiliza la inceput sau la final in functie de programul selectat. Daca aburul este eliberat la inceputul programului are rolul de a inmuia hainele murdare usurand astfel procesul de curatare, iar daca este eliberat la final are o contributie majora pentru inlaturarea cutelor, tesaturile devenind placute la atingere. ExtraSteam trateaza cu delicatete hainele si te ajuta sa te bucuri de ele un timp indelungat.</p><p style="margin-left:0in;"> </p><p style="margin-left:0in;"><div  class="js-description-video-thumbnail" data-sources="" style="position: relative;background-image: url('https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/catalog/video/preview/encoding/delivery/thumbnail/54891_2107603960.jpg?width=640&height=360&hash=988EAFF6765BE3D9FB0A49863A0B9845'); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; background-size: contain;width: 480px; height: 320px;"><div style="position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; margin-top: -32px; margin-left: -32px; background-image: url('https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/play_symbol@2x.png'); width: 64px; height: 64px;"></div></div> 
</p></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><p><strong>Tipul de masina</strong> de spalat rufe <strong>standard</strong> este cea mai intalnita varianta, deoarece poate fi plasata oriunde, atat timp cat este conectata la un canal de scurgere si la o instalatie de apa. <br><br>Masina de spalat cu <strong>incarcare frontala</strong> este un model clasic, datorita hubloului transparent prin care poti observa usor ce se intampla cu rufele tale.</p><p><strong>Capacitatea masinii de spalat</strong>, exprimata in kilograme, reprezinta greutatea hainelor pe care masina de spalat le poate spala eficient, fara a folosi surplus de energie sau de apa sau fara a dura prea mult si a afecta eficienta procesului de spalare. Capacitatea de spalare se masoara in haine uscate.</p><p>Diametrul mare de <strong>34 cm</strong> al hubloului iti permite incarcarea foarte usoara a rufelor murdare in masina de spalat. Hubloul este pozitionat mai sus, prin comparatie cu celelalte masini de spalat, ceea ce permite o incarcare mult mai facila a masinii de spalat. </p><p><strong>Viteza de centrifugare </strong>este exprimata in rotatii pe minut si este un alt criteriu de care trebuie tinut cont atunci cand este achizitionata o masina de spalat. Cu cat viteza de centrifugare e mai mare, cu atat mai uscate sunt hainele dupa spalare.<br><br><strong>Nivelul de zgomot </strong> este important daca avem nevoie de liniste sau un zgomot redus. Este masurat in decibeli iar o valoare mica iti va asigura confortul dorit.</p><p> </p><p><strong>Consumul</strong> de energie electrica si de apa al masinii de spalat rufe este dat si prin clasa de eficienta energetica. Cu cat clasa de eficienta energetica este mai mare, de la A+++ la D, cu atat consumul de energie si apa este mai mic.</p></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Programe</strong></td><td> </td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Camasi 40°C cu ExtraSteam</strong><br><br>Acest program este folosit pentru a spala impreuna camasi din bumbac, materiale sintetice sau combinate. Reduce cutele. La sfarsitul programului se utilizeaza abur pentru a ajuta la reducerea cutelor.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_ae59d63a06b3ceaf3227b42c439fcb8b.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Geci cu puf 40°C cu ExtraSteam</strong><br><br>Acest program este dedicat pentru a va spala hainele, vestele, jachetele etc. ce contin puf, a caror eticheta recomanda „spalare la masina”. La sfarsitul programului se utilizeaza abur pentru a inmuia rufele groase precum prosoapele.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_4e1319d6c87cfe29cfe3228bca81b1a1.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Bumbac 60 C cu prespalare</strong></p><p>Program dedicat spalarii hainelor de bumbac care necesita prespalare. Aceasta optiune va asigura o mai buna indepartare a petelor, fara a agresa tesatura.</p><p> </p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_1c68e893f9294d37a79c0c7b031e2f47.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure><p style="text-align:center;"> </p></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><p style="margin-left:0px;"><strong>Spalare rapida 30 grade C</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Program dedicat hainelor din bumbac, cu un grad redus de murdarie. Ai haine gata de purtare, in cel mai scurt timp posibil.</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_1d509124d672a219759060c24d01bd4c.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Lana/Spalare manuala</strong></p><p><span style="font-size:14px;">Acest program este dedicat articolelor din lana/materialelor delicate cu conditia sa fie respectate instructiuniile de pe eticheta. Rufele vor fi igenizate utilizandu-se o actiune de spalare delicata pentru a nu deteriora imbracamintea. Te poti bucura in continuare de hainele tale delicate fara a iti face griji ca tesaturile vor avea de suferit.</span></p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_d4c87b644503723473baec7c6cb28bb8.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><p><strong>Bumbac 40°C</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Program de spalare la 40 grade a rufelor din bumbac. Astfel, poti obtine rufe curate chiar si atunci cand tesatura este delicata.</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32259/32258677/media/res_c0684fe8384ae55843d77393f1e4f098.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td colspan="2"><strong>Tehnologii si functii</strong></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Amanare pornire</strong><br><br>Functia iti permite programarea spalarii intr-un interval de 9 ore. Astfel, nu mai esti nevoit sa iti planifici activitatile dupa programul de spalare a rufelor. Tu decizi cand incepe programul dorit, indiferent de durata sau intensitate.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/20155/20154438/media/res_958e593e2a0ab5270e3980c4ddce597e.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Child Lock</strong><br><br>Permite blocarea butoanelor masinii de spalat pentru a preveni oprirea accidentala sau schimbarea programului. Aparatul tau Arctic este gandit sa iti ofere un plus de siguranta, fiind potrivit pentru tine si familia ta. Copiii tai se pot juca langa masina de spalat, fara ca tu sa-i supraveghezi permanent.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_f9e3d6a7cc411784e0ff80d4c7d9ff31.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Sistem electronic de control al balansului</strong><br><br>Sistemul distribuie uniform rufele in interiorul tamburului (recipientul in care sunt spalate rufele), diminuand vibratiile si zgomotul produs in timpul stoarcerii, pentru o functionare mai silentioasa. Poti folosi masina de spalat Arctic in orice moment al zilei. Speli eficient si cu minim de zgomot!</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_ce173a0732bd7fad206d1e0f920bf33d.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><p style="margin-left:0px;"><strong>Sistem electronic de ajustare a cantitatii de apa</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Pentru a obtine cele mai bune performante de spalare si consum energetic redus, acest sistem automat de reglare a consumului de apa vine in ajutorul tau! Aportul de apa este ajustat electronic in functie de cantitatea si tipul rufelor, astfel ca tu sa ai cele mai bune rezultate cu un minim de efort.</p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_63a623a596ffdc85739d1bab129e2b71.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Aqua Surf</strong><br><br>Design-ul special Aqua Surf creeaza conditii optime de spalare pentru rufele tale si asigura o curatare eficienta, dar si delicata, fara miscari ce ar putea afecta tesatura. Conturul unic al cuvei si forma paletelor permit o miscare fluida a rufelor in timpul spalarii, imitand ritmul natural al valurilor.</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/8947/8946499/media/res_0e95602328918cf3a401e27dac03127e.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><strong>Eco Heater</strong><br><br>Rezistenta masinii este acoperita cu un strat de nichel care protejeaza de rugina si asigura o durabilitate de 100 de ori mai mare decat rezistentele standard si depuneri de calcar cu 40% mai mici. Masina ta va functiona eficient si economic pentru o perioada indelungata!</td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/16415/16414105/media/res_4e162da79748cd771ded610feecdeb57.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr><tr><td><p style="margin-left:0px;"><strong>Autocuratare cu ExtraSteam</strong></p><p style="margin-left:0px;">Acest program te ajuta sa indepartezi rezidurile si depunerile de detergent cu ajutorul aburului, astfel ca masina ta de spalat isi mentine buna functionare o perioada cat mai indelungata si de asemenea, se indeparteaza mirosurile neplacute. </p></td><td><figure class="image" style="height:199px;width:300px;"><img style="height:199px;width:300px;" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" alt="" align="" data-src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net//products/32061/32060963/media/res_1c2f6e465d40d91c6550606af467a17f.jpg" class=" lazy" width=" src=" height=" src=" /></figure></td></tr><tr><td> </td><td> </td></tr></tbody></table></figure>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</script>
                    </div>
                    <div class="product-page-description-ad hidden-xs hidden-sm">
                        <div id="tpb_product_description"></div>
            <div class="description-search-link">
            Vezi si: <a href="/detergenti-rufe/c">Detergenti online de rufe</a>
        </div>
                        </div>
                </div>
                            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 100%"></div>
    </div><p class="mrg-top-xs font-size-sm text-muted verified-order" data-lazy-phino="Dropdown" data-ph-content="Produs cumparat de la eMAG sau de la un partener certificat eMAG Marketplace" data-ph-align="SW NW">

        </p></div>
                        <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-7061303">Am luat-o de black friday la super preț.<br> Este foarte bună, merită toți banii.<br> Chiar aveam nevoie de o mașină de spălat micuță.<br> <br> Cam lungi programele si cam mare consumul de apă.</div></div>

    <div class="col-md-10">
        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/masina-de-spalat-rufe-arctic-6kg-1000-rpm-clasa-e-extrasteam-eco-dose-alb-apl61015xlw3/pd/DPHC37MBM/review/6941292">Nu recomand</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-1  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 20%"></div>
    </div></div>
                        <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-6941292">Nu recomand. Am cumpărat dar sunt foarte dezamăgită, la centrifugare face un zgomot mare și pleacă de la locul ei!</div></div>

        <div class="review-meta-area pad-sep-xs">
                <span class="review-meta">
                    <a href="#" role="button" class="vote-feedback-btn js-vote-review no-underline gtm_prod_page_reviews_useful_rev">
                        <i class="em em-vote-off font-size-lg"></i>
                        <span class="vote-review-text">1</span>
                    </a>

                        <i class="em em-vote-on font-size-lg"></i>
                        <span class="vote-review-text">1</span>
                    </a>
                </span>
                <span class="review-meta">
                    <a href="#" data-lazy-phino="CollapseOne" data-ph-target="#review-6941292-new-comment" class="js-add-comment-link no-underline pad-sep-xs">
                        <i class="em em-add-comment font-size-lg"></i>
                        <span class="inline-block--top">
                            <span class="hidden-xs">Adauga comentariu</span>
                            <span class="visible-xs-inline">Comentează</span>
                        </span>
                    </a>
                </span>

    <div class="table-layout mrg-btm-xs">
        <div class="table-cell table-cell-avatar">
            <a href="/product-feedback/user-profile/0a7650dcd6323abd90a13a88b776fe016490732032"><div class="user-avatar"><div class="thumbnail" style="background-color: #9c27b0">
            <span class="ini">A</span><div class="picture" data-background-image="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/avatars/1539173627_logo_nou_arctic_plum_fara_slogan-01.png?width=40&amp;height=40&amp;hash=38BE738B96C0B1B9040B9587DF622D43"></div></div>

    </div>
    <p class="js-comment-content js-view-only">Buna ziua. Ne pare rau pentru experienta pe care ati avut-o si va multumim frumos pentru feedback. Va asiguram ca parerile clientilor nostri sunt foarte importante pentru noi si acordam o atentie deosebita tuturor recomandarilor care vin din partea acestora. Pentru a va ajuta in solutionarea problemei va rugam sa ne trimiteti toate aceste detalii despre problema pe care o aveti cu produsul pe adresa de mail: service@arctic[punct]ro si unul dintre consultantii nostri va lua legatura cu dumneavoastra pentru solutionare. <br> Echipa Arctic</p>
</div>

</div><div class="product-review-item js-review-item row" data-id="6927678" data-product-pnk="DPHC37MBM" data-product-sef-name="masina-de-spalat-rufe-arctic-6kg-1000-rpm-clasa-e-extrasteam-eco-dose-alb-apl61015xlw3">
    <div class="col-md-2"><div class="product-review-head"><div class="product-review-user-avatar">
                    <a href="/product-feedback/user-profile/27eac1d56677fa05d195b97f6af0a9001651212032"><div class="user-avatar user-avatar-sm"><div class="thumbnail" style="background-color: #9c27b0">
            <span class="ini">EU</span></div>
    </div></a>
                </div>
                <div class="product-review-user-meta">
                    <p class="product-review-author mrg-top-xs semibold">Elena U</p>
                    <p class="small text-muted mrg-sep-none">22 Mar 2022</p></div></div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-10">
        <div class="product-review-body"><h3 class="product-review-title"><a href="/product-feedback/masina-de-spalat-rufe-arctic-6kg-1000-rpm-clasa-e-extrasteam-eco-dose-alb-apl61015xlw3/pd/DPHC37MBM/review/6927678">Foarte multumita</a></h3>
            <div class="star-rating-container mrg-btm-xs">
                <div class="star-rating star-rating-read rated-5  star-rating-sm  ">
        <div class="star-rating-inner " style="width: 100%"></div>
    </div><p class="mrg-top-xs font-size-sm text-muted verified-order" data-lazy-phino="Dropdown" data-ph-content="Produs cumparat de la eMAG sau de la un partener certificat eMAG Marketplace" data-ph-align="SW NW">
            <i class="em em-verified text-success"></i> <span class="semibold">Review client eMAG</span>
        </p></div>
                        <div class="mrg-btm-xs js-review-body review-body-container" id="review-body-collapse-6927678">Am schimbat masina ca am avunt un Indesit slim, care m-a tinut 5 ani pana s-a stricat. Asta e mult mai silentioasa si vad ca spala mult mai bine. Fata de Indesit, e la ani lumina.</div></div>

        <div class="review-meta-area pad-sep-xs">

        <p class="js-view-only">
            <span class="js-answer-content">Buna ziua. Pentru a beneficia de 5 ani garantie produsul trebuie inregistrat in platforma de extragarantie de pe site-ul Arctic, in termen de 30 de zile de la data achizitiei, in perioada campaniei. Toate informatiile sunt prezentate in regulamentul campaniei.<br> Echipa Arctic</span>
            <a class="hidden small js-edit-area" href="#">Editează</a>
        </p>

        <div id="question-answers-5384466" class="question-answer-box">
            <div class="js-question-answers-list question-answers-list"><div class="answer-item  js-answer-item mrg-top-xs">
    <div class="question-item-avatar">
        <div class="question-user-avatar"><a href="/product-feedback/user-profile/0a7650dcd6323abd90a13a88b776fe016490732032"><div class="user-avatar user-avatar-xs"><div class="thumbnail" style="background-color: #9c27b0">
            <span class="ini">A</span><div class="picture" data-background-image="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/avatars/1539173627_logo_nou_arctic_plum_fara_slogan-01.png?width=40&amp;height=40&amp;hash=38BE738B96C0B1B9040B9587DF622D43"></div></div>
    </div></a>
        </div>
        <div class="question-item-meta text-muted">                <div class="text-muted small">
                                            <a href="/product-feedback/user-profile/0a7650dcd6323abd90a13a88b776fe016490732032" class="gtm_sitewide_feedback_username question-author">Arctic</a>

                    21 Apr 2021
                </div>

    </div>
    <div class="question-item-content js-answer-row mrg-top-xs" data-user-id="6490732" data-answer-id="5408427">
        <p class="js-view-only">
            <span class="js-answer-content">Buna ziua, Cristi. In manualul de utilizare, la pag 15, poti vedea durata tuturor programelor si poti alege in functie de nevoile tale: <a href="https://www.arctic.ro/media/products/manuale/APL61015XLW3.pdf" target="_blank">www.arctic.ro/media/products/manuale/APL61015XLW3.pdf</a>. <br> Echipa Arctic</span>
            <a class="hidden small js-edit-area" href="#">Editează</a>
        </p>
